Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui

Class GUI

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.GUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
UI
public class GUI
extends javafx.application.Application
implements UI
The Gui class Extends Application Implements UI There are some static function used in Gui Controllers to avoid code duplicate

    • fixImages

      public static void fixImages​(javafx.scene.image.ImageView back, java.lang.Double backHeight, javafx.scene.image.ImageView[] images, java.lang.Double[] x, java.lang.Double[] y, java.lang.Double imageHeight)
      For a given image view ad a given set of images fix their relative position in a resizable scene On all images will be set preserve ratio
      Parameters:
      back - - of type ImageView reference to the background image
      backHeight - - of type Double height of the original image in background
      images - - of type ImageView[] array containing all the image you want to fix
      x - - of type Double[] array containing coordinate x of the wanted position
      y - - of type Double[] array containing coordinate y of the wanted position
      imageHeight - - of type Double[] height of all the image with the respect to the background original image

    • fixImagesToPane

      public static void fixImagesToPane​(javafx.scene.layout.Pane pane, java.lang.Double paneHeight, java.lang.Double paneWidth, javafx.scene.image.ImageView[] images, java.lang.Double[] x, java.lang.Double[] y, java.lang.Double imageHeight)
      For a given pane ad a given set of images fix their relative position in a resizable scene On all images will be set preserve ratio
      Parameters:
      pane - - of type Pane reference to the background pane
      paneHeight - - of type Double height of the pane
      paneWidth - - of type Double height of the pane
      images - - of type ImageView[] array containing all the image you want to fix
      x - - of type Double[] array containing coordinate x of the wanted position
      y - - of type Double[] array containing coordinate y of the wanted position
      imageHeight - - of type Double[] height of all the image with the respect to the background pane height

    • fixImagesToPane

      paneWidth - - of type Double height of the pane
      image - - of type ImageView image you want to fix
      x - - of type Double coordinate x of the wanted position
      y - - of type Double coordinate y of the wanted position

    • fixLabels

      For a given image view ad a given set of Control fix their relative position in a resizable scene On all images will be set preserve ratio

    • printDepots

      public void printDepots​(javafx.scene.image.ImageView[] resources, Depots depots)
      Print depots given a set of ImageView properly positioned. DO not change the position of the ImageView, just set a new Image,
      Parameters:
      resources - the resources - of type ImageView[] an array containing the imageView where resources will be printed
      depots - the depots - of type Depots

    • printResources

      public void printResources​(javafx.scene.image.ImageView[] number, NumberOfResources resources)
      Print a generic Number of resources. DO not print the resource icons, but just the numbers in the corresponding order
      Parameters:
      number - the number - of type ImageView[] an array containing the imageView where number will be printed
      resources - the resources - of type NUmberOfResources
